snippet: The three, Mike Duffy, Pamela Wallin and Patrick Brazeau, were appointed by Prime Minister Stephen Harper.
abstract: Canadian Senate votes to suspend without pay Mike Duffy, Pamela Wallin and Patrick Brazeau, three senators at the center of an expenses scandal.
lead_paragraph: The three, Mike Duffy, Pamela Wallin and Patrick Brazeau, were appointed by Prime Minister Stephen Harper.

headline.main: Canada: 3 Senators Suspended in Expenses Scandal
headline.print_headline: Canada: 3 Senators Suspended in Expenses Scandal
